p: Public health has always been a prime issue due to the continuous emerging of pandemics in last two decades. There were outbreaks of SARS-CoV-1, MERS-CoV, and now the current pandemic Coronavirus disease of 2019 (COVID-19) has become an extreme threat to human life, the livelihood, and also has brought about relentless social-economical along with political issues in the tainted countries [ 1]. The WHO has categorized COVID-19 as a pandemic [ 2]. The International Committee on Taxonomy of Viruses (ICTV) gave the name for this virus as severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) [ 3]. COVID-19 causes ARDS-Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome, a condition in which fluids get collected in the air sacs of lung and causes organ oxygen deprivation. The virus has shown similarity with Bat SARS-like coronavirus of more than 87.99% uniqueness in sequencing, and also 80.0% uniqueness of nucleotide with the original SARS epidemic virus [ 4, 5]. It was found that genome of CoV encodes two proteins ppla and pplb which are involved in the formation of nucleoprotein, spike, and membrane while it is also involved in the replicase, and polymerase activity of viruses [ 6].
